3.name: Narration
3.text:
The village is burning red. The raging flames of
the crimson fire are consuming the houses, the
livestock is drowning in a sea of blood, and the
villagers are desperately fleeing in confusion.

4.name: Narration
4.text:
Not long ago, it was supposed to be a peaceful,
gentle night. However, suddenly, the sound of
powerful wings flapping announced disaster to the
village.

5.name: Narration
5.text:
The red dragon Evennajetoldor indulges in
destruction and slaughter as it pleases. The
sensation of biting into fragile humans, and the
taste of their blood and flesh bursting in the
mouth, is exquisite. Especially when they were
shedding tears of fear until just before being
devoured, it becomes exceptional.

6.name: Narration
6.text:
Its swinging tail easily knocks down houses, and
with each swipe of its claws and fangs, lives
burst. Its scorching breath turns everything
around it into a sea of flames. Its crimson
silhouette was truly the embodiment of disaster.

8.name: Narration
8.text:
That day, the village was destroyed by the
capricious play of a single red dragon. It is said
that out of nearly 100 villagers, only three
survived.

13.name: Narration
13.text:
The massive body, which had been coiled up and
sleeping, raised its head. It recognized Sol's
figure and displayed a sadistic smile, as if to
say, "You've finally arrived."

14.name: Sol
14.text:
"For everyone's sake! For the sake of my mother! I
will avenge her!"

16.name: Narration
16.text:
The red dragon roars, causing the surroundings to
tremble in fear. However, there are those who
stand up to it. Enduring the despair that eats
away at their hearts and the scorching heat
burning their bodies, the adventurers take up
their weapons and step forward.

17.name: Narration
17.text:
The golden little dragon mustered its courage and
dashed towards the gigantic shadow. That became
the signal for battle...!
